TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because they forget not to fall. Try it, all you have to do is jump from somewhere high and distract yourself before hitting the ground. (I suggest starting doing this above water till you get the hang of it)

Why do nerds, suddenly drink beer?

They don't pay attention to the inessential external circumstances.

As Mars is a chocolate, does it mean that Phobos and Deimos are peanuts?

Yes. I wonder where the shell went.

Could the shell be used as a generation ship?

Yes, several generations of hermit crabs can share the shell in their time.

If a girl may have a pony, does it mean that there are girls with a forehead horn to have a unicorn?

I will ask Dilema, she is sure to know.

If a Kerbal claps in a forest, where the heck is this forest?

In the game detalization settings.

When the debris count is limited with 250, does it mean that by breaking a bottle in a bar, you eliminate hundreds of broken satellites in orbit?

What a novel idea. I am going to say yes.

Are the ideas in novels, novel ideas?

A nouvelle idee fixe is still an idee.

Is an overturned mortar a rocket pogo?

Not if it has a pestle.

Can you use a mortar to make the mortar that you use to patch the damage created by a mortar?

If you are a high-level herbalist with a legendary mortar.

Why do the Marvel superheroes look more stupid than the DC ones?

Sheer numbers, they pumped out so many that any good ones  got used up early.

What's mud got to do with it, what's mud but a second hand emotion?

A mud mood caused by the e-motion equipment test.

Why is the ETDCtrl.exe process so annoying?

Edited July 25 by kerbiloid

Because you know what it does. For the rest of us it is "Say What?"

Is this a Lager I see before me?

It's la guerre.

Why is Australia not attracted by the Antarctics.

Because baby it's cold outside.

If it is the Antarctic, then shouldn't it be hot?

Yes, and the penguins are actually South bears.

Where is the Arc of the Arctic?

In the plot of it's hit movie.

Am I a figment of your imagination?

No, just of your own.

Can we see neutrons?

Yep.

Can we see quarks?

Yes, but should we?

Spoiler


Why are the fatty fried sausages  more healthy than the rabbits' food?

Edited July 26 by kerbiloid

Because "Rabbit" has an appaling diet.

Is it quiet?

Edited July 27 by ColdJ

It's quiet allright.

What do the matches match?

Well matches match catches, though not soccer matches, but cricket and baseball where they can catch matches.

Is something amiss with verse such as this, I feel like I may be riding a wave of some bliss?

Miss Bliss gives a kiss. Thiss iss what could people miss.

Why is the huge ball of rocks above the heads considered romantic?

It makes sure the relationship is a knockout.

How many AI does it take to screw in a lightbulb?
